data.text:
@EU_Commission 😍🎼☀️
Make your life worth living
Make your gift worth giving
Make your choir worth singing
Echo notes worth bells ringing♥️
@EU_Commission More poor for people.
@EU_Commission how
@EU_Commission You are supporting the speech of convicted absconder EX PM of Pakistan Nawaz Sharif today. He failed to produce a money trail of his properties in London. Shame EU
@EU_Commission you want our blood, fuck you
@EU_Commission Hope you will overdliver...
@EU_Commission You should be educated just to take a jab without mandate and you need to be train not to steal vaccines to poor people. You just need to be decent persons.

@EU_Commission Senator Menendez, Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairman says what is happening in Tigray is a GENOCIDE.
I say it is in many ways more than a genocide. It is more than what happened in Darfur or Rwanda. It is a GENOCIDE+.
@EU_Commission @annekekassteele Ban all poison and poluting water

@EU_Commission The oppressed Ugandans can't object you from fulfilling your interests but we only need you to ask for accountability, ensure that there's rule of law in Africa and respect for Human rights coz the dictators are too much.#M7NovMassacreUg

@EU_Commission i "liked" your twitt but... Seriously!
People and the World do not work like this.
If one want individual involvment, it must start with proper education. For EVERYBODY.

Appealing to participate by twitter can even be counter-productive.
The same ones will give their opinion.

@EU_Commission I think true debate is good. Let’s all have an open democratic debate about whether EU institutes & employees are value for money, whether integration is right & should EU arrogantly claim it’s Europe & alter the dictionary definition of words like European, democracy, rights etc

@EU_Commission @EU_Commission halkı aldatmakla,yaşam korkusu, gelecek kaygısıyla,varmış gibi göstermeye çalıştıkları özgürlük ve refah  umuduyla insanların önüne  sopa-havuç taktiğiyle umut tacirliği yapan elitlerin puzzle lı haline dönüştürdükleri sahte bir yönetmeme sömürü sistemidir!

@EU_Commission L'EU è in fiamme e fate finta che tutto va bene?? 
The EU is on fire and you pretend that everything is fine?
@EU_Commission 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🇮🇳🇪🇺
@EU_Commission 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🇮🇳🇪🇺
